Activity: Log in to the EHR system, check patient assignments for the day. Review standardized protocols for influenza symptom assessment.
Conduct patient assessments for influenza symptoms using standardized protocols. Document findings in the EHR.
Administer influenza vaccinations to scheduled patients. Ensure all vaccination details are accurately entered into the EHR.
Continue patient assessments and vaccinations. Cross-check EHR entries for completeness and accuracy.
Review any pending EHR entries. Follow up with @mrs-1 and @mrs-2 to ensure all patient data is complete.
Prepare for the next day by checking the patient schedule and ensuring all necessary supplies are stocked.
